title: Toledo Police – Bodycam & 911 Records for August 10, 2025 Welfare Check (13 Children Found in Unsafe Conditions)

communications.subject: Ohio Open Records Law Request: Toledo Police – Bodycam & 911 Records for August 10, 2025 Welfare Check (13 Children Found in Unsafe Conditions)
communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Ohio Open Records Law, I hereby request the following records:

All body-worn camera footage from Toledo Police officers responding on August 10, 2025 to a welfare check/animal complaint at a residence on Raymer Boulevard, Toledo, OH, where officers discovered 13 children living in unsafe and unsanitary conditions.

Any associated 911 call recordings, CAD call logs, and radio dispatch audio related to this incident.

Please include video from all officers on scene.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 10 business days.

Sincerely,

Daniel Wilkinson

title: North Haven Police – Bodycam & 911 Records for Arrest of Christian Senberg (Enticement of a Minor, July 2025)

communications.subject: Connecticut Freedom of Information Act Request: North Haven Police – Bodycam & 911 Records for Arrest of Christian Senberg (Enticement of a Minor, July 2025)
communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Connecticut Freedom of Information Act, I hereby request the following records:

All body-worn camera footage from North Haven Police officers during the investigation and arrest of Christian Senberg in July 2025 on charges of enticement of a minor and risk of injury to a child.

Also, any 911 call recordings, CAD call logs, and radio dispatch traffic associated with this case.

Please include video from all officers on scene, from initial contact through arrest and booking.

I also request that, if possible and pursuant to Conn. Gen. Stat. § 1-212(d), fees be waived as I believe this request is in the public interest and not made for commercial gain. The requested documents will be made available to the public at MuckRock.com.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 4 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Daniel Wilkinson
